technology.short_description: A pungent triumph of sorcerous alchemy: a rich essential oil that binds a Soul Grinder's Warpmetal husk to the residual soul-stuff of the dead Daemon within.

effects.description: Vigour loss reduction: -33% for Soul Grinder of Slaanesh units
Bonus vs Large: +15 for Soul Grinder of Slaanesh units

technology.short_description: A pincer strike which requires close contact to truly appreciate the skin scent. Only to be relished once.

effects.description: Melee attack: +6 for all Daemonic Cavalry and Chariot units
Weapon strength: +10% all Daemonic Cavalry and Chariot units

technology.short_description: A cloying sillage that can almost be touched. For some Daemons, it is all the sustenance they need.

effects.description: Upkeep: -10% for all Daemonic units
Global recruitment duration: -1 turns for all Slaanesh Daemonic Units

technology.short_description: An anointment that confers agony upon the skin of the wearer can only be made pleasurable by closeness to others similarly anointed, and observing their kindred plight.

effects.description: Allegiance points gained: +25%
+1 Allied Recruitment Unit capacity per army
Seductive influence: +100% from Cults and Outposts

technology.short_description: The full scent unfurls only after the wearer's foe is broken, notes darkened by leathery resignation, then sweetened by passionate surrender to Slaanesh.

effects.description: Casualties captured post-battle: +15%
Income from post-battle loot: +25%

technology.short_description: A delectable, vibrant bouquet of the forbidden, guaranteed to reduce even the strongest of minds to gibbering, lust-craved depravity.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +20 with all factions

Army ability: "Fascination"
	(all armies)

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs units with 25 or more entities

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

technology.short_description: For her or for him, Invigorating Essence exudes a confident aura of unstoppable, merciless cruelty.

effects.description: Daemons Reforged: +10% chance for destroyed Daemons of Slaanesh units to be restored after battle
Casualty replenishment rate: +6%

technology.short_description: The scent which completes the transition of obsession from a state of mind into a state of being.

effects.description:
Character experience gain: +15%
	(all characters)

Ward save: 5%
	(all characters)

technology.short_description: The irresistible scent of success, creatively mixing fruity and floral notes with an unexpected and refreshing infusion of eternally unquenched greed.

effects.description: Income from all buildings: +10%

technology.short_description: Designed for today's busy Daemonette outrider, this confident and contemporary fragrance will make its wearer feel able to charm time itself.

effects.description: Bonus vs Infantry: +8 for Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot and Hellflayers units
Charge bonus: +12 for Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot and Hellflayers units

technology.short_description: Spur oneself to ever-greater feats of lust and atrocity, with a heady floral blend that evokes both Spring's first sunrise and an aeon of unspeakable torment.

effects.description: Leadership: +10 for Seekers, Heartseekers and Pleasureseekers units
Speed: +12% for Seekers, Heartseekers and Pleasureseekers unitss

technology.short_description: Its inexorable onset carries over into Slaanesh's Chaos domain, for that is where it takes those unfortunate enough to sense it.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Frenzy" for Chaos Furies, Fiends of Slaanesh and Champions of Slaanesh units

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

effects.description: Charge bonus: +8 for Chaos Furies, Fiends of Slaanesh and Champions of Slaanesh units

technology.short_description: Scent is the gateway to memory… and the gateway back from the Chaos Realms, a blistering aromatic accord folding a Daemon's essence back into a depraved whole.

effects.description: Daemons Reforged: +10% chance for destroyed Daemons of Slaanesh units to be restored after battle
Daemons Reforged: +10% hit points for destroyed Daemons of Slaanesh units restored after battle

technology.short_description: An elegant bouquet of cedarwood essence and unbridled insanity, Frenzied Hysteria is inspired by the reckless savagery of starving wolf packs.

effects.description: Bound spell: "Hysterical Frenzy" for Keeper of Secrets units

technology.short_description: Fresh from the Circle of Carnality, the surprisingly fruity Slaanesh's Lash initially evokes rapture without end, before lingering on the delectable fragrance of agonised flesh.

effects.description: Bound spell: "Pavane of Slaanesh" for Keeper of Secrets units

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs units with 25 or more entities

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

technology.short_description: Bold top-notes of sensuality entwined with an subtle base of relentless, pitiless brutality. This is ethereal beauty meets torment-filled death, with a lingering citrus mist.

effects.description: Devotee upkeep: -20% for Disciple Armies

technology.short_description: Some days, you want every head turned in your direction – but some days you want every head parted from its shoulders. On those days, only Wanton Destruction will do.

effects.description: Upkeep: -3%
Income from razing settlements: +25%

technology.short_description: Proudly presenting the dark kiss of Slaanesh himself. The subtle, lingering warmth of hesitant submission gives way to overwhelming, sublime abandon.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +30 with Dark Elves and Slaanesh

Slaanesh corruption: +1
	(all characters)

technology.short_description: A perfumed dance across the senses, an irresistible trio of desire, submission and depravity that will cause any soul to welcome Slaanesh into their heart.

effects.description:
Slaanesh corruption: +1
	(all Cultist and Druchii Anointed Heroes)

Spread Corruption action: Slaanesh corruption is increased by an additional 1
	(all Cultist and Druchii Anointed Heroes)
Hero action success chance: +6% for Cultists and Druchii Anointed

technology.short_description: Because even a nauseating, indescribable affront to existence itself deserves to smell like freshly-cut roses.

effects.description: Upkeep: -50% for Lords
Lord recruit rank: +3

technology.short_description: High notes of sandalwood and distilled soul essence ensure maximum compliance, while subtle hints of Ruinous flora transmute agonised exhaustion into unbridled ecstasy.

effects.description: Proliferate Cults cost: -25%

technology.short_description: This blend, so subtle as to be almost scentless, carries in head, heart and soul the same note, that of the Dark Prince's voice, humming His grace.

effects.description: Physical resistance: 5% for all Daemonic units

technology.short_description: After this fragrance comes into contact with a Daemonette's musk, the scents combine into pinpricks of frustrated desire, befuddling foes and turning away their weapons.

effects.description: Missile Block Chance: +10% for Daemonettes and Exalted Daemonettes
Melee defence: +5 for Daemonettes and Exalted Daemonettes

technology.short_description: Projected by the alluring top notes of inescapable seduction and freshly-flayed soul, this sophisticated fragrance is grounded in a creamy, musk-like base.

effects.description: Armour-piercing weapon damage: +3 for Daemonettes and Exalted Daemonettes
Attribute: Unyielding Assault for Daemonettes and Exalted Daemonettes

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can never have its Melee Attack reduced during battle.

technology.short_description: Each flacon is tailored specifically to a single servant of Slaanesh, containing both the whiff of their recent oblivion and their Prince's command to rise up once more.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +8%

technology.short_description: Inspire ever-greater acts of deviancy and indulgence, thanks to the frothy musk of the Skull Throne's blind and witless hatred of our Perfect Prince.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: -25 with Khornate factions
Leadership: +10 when fighting against Khornate factions
Melee defence: +4 when fighting against Khornate factions

technology.short_description: Brittle and crystalline top notes solidify in a leathery base as the scent dries on the skin, and then becomes it.

effects.description: Armour: +10 for all Monsters and Beasts
Missile resistance: 15% for all Monsters and Beasts

technology.short_description: A new chapter in sheer excess. Pain and pleasure mingle with the powdery scent of freshly-harvested souls to create an unforgettable vision of overwhelming power.

effects.description: Recruit rank: +2 for Keeper of Secrets units
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +75 for Keeper of Secrets units
Charge bonus: +12 for Keeper of Secrets units

technology.short_description: The entrancing smell of immortal ecstasy. Perfumed oils blend with nymph-like vanilla notes to achieve a long-lasting shiver of blasphemous pleasure.

effects.description: Number of uses: +1 for bound spells on Keeper of Secrets units

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs units with 25 or more entities

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

technology.short_description: A revolution in forbidden, sense-shattering fragrance, direct from the Palace of Pleasure itself, its invigorating excess is guaranteed to linger for all eternity.

effects.description: Devotees from Gift of Slaanesh: +25

technology.short_description: Blending citrus fruit with unfiltered mortal greed, let all around know that unfathomable wealth awaits those who lay waste in the Dark Prince's name.

effects.description: Upkeep: -3%
Income from sacking settlements: +25%

technology.short_description: Enrobe one's flesh in velvety tendrils of seduction that no soul in any known realm can possibly resist.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +30 with Humans, High Elves, Wood Elves and Dwarfs

technology.short_description: The savour of a skittish foal's soul and the tang of a predator's excitement in pursuit vie for dominance in this perfume.

effects.description:
Replenishes 10% campaign movement range after winning a battle
	(all characters)

technology.short_description: The sharp spice of curiosity has been slaked in the cold balm of unquestioning servitude to salve the contradictions within Slaanesh's followers.

effects.description: Global recruitment capacity: +1

Local recruitment capacity: +1
	(all provinces)

technology.short_description: Inspired by the sense-numbing aromas of the Circle of Indolency, this iconic Slaaneshi fragrance transforms the misery of captivity into the infinite joy of absolute submission.

effects.description: Construction cost: -15% for all buildings

technology.short_description: Alluring whiffs of promised power reveal a buoying heart-note of perseverance, a fragrance even the lowliest of the Dark Prince's servants must carry.

effects.description: Leadership: +6 for all non-Daemonic units

technology.short_description: The heady thrill of blood-soaked victory, distilled to its delicious, agonised essence and guaranteed to reshape mere flesh into rippling perfection.

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Marauders, Marauder cavalry and Devotees of Slaanesh units
Missile resistance: 10% for Marauders, Marauder cavalry and Devotees of Slaanesh units

technology.short_description: A gush of arterial blood holds piercing freshness, the minute spray forming a lingering sanguine memory along the Slaaneshi warrior's blade.

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for all non-Daemonic Infantry units
Weapon strength: +10% for all non-Daemonic Infantry units

technology.short_description: A flowery bouquet of otherwordly gardens blossoms into a promise that turns mortal longing into irresistible urgency.

effects.description: Speed: +10% for all non-Daemonic Infantry units
Melee defence: +4 for all non-Daemonic Infantry units

technology.short_description: Untamed beauty meets enduring pain, in this sense-shattering bombardment of red berries and endlessly-repeating wounds.

effects.description: Bound spell: "Slicing Shards" for Keeper of Secrets units

technology.short_description: An ambery infusion of dream and nightmare. Its distinctively smoky layers will shred the last vestiges of sanity from any mind.

effects.description: Bound spell: "Phantasmagoria" for Keeper of Secrets units

technology.short_description: As captivating as it is radiant, the enticing sweetness of Blissful Coquetry is complemented by a dazzling blend of powerfully hypnotic spices. Rapture is assured.

effects.description: Pleasurable act resource costs: -30%

technology.short_description: Presenting the bottled essence of the Circle of Avidity, offering the scintillating promise of riches beyond measure, and laced with a kiss of venal folly.

effects.description: Upkeep: -3%
Income from looting settlements: +25%

technology.short_description: The gleam of fresh sweat upon warm skin; the shiver of a midnight kiss; the touch of lace upon ready flesh.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +30 with Warriors of Chaos, Beastmen and Norsca

technology.short_description: Some lessons are not learned, but simply *known*, as in a dream revealing the dreamer to not be the prey, but the predator.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain: +20%
	(all armies)

technology.short_description: Concocted from oils combining flora and fauna from both the mortal world and Slaanesh's Realm, its scent leads His servants along the shortest route to their goal.

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -10%
Recruit rank: +1 for all units

technology.short_description: Nothing says indisputable power and authority like the heady fragrance of damned souls screaming for all eternity.

effects.description: Construction time: -1 for Province Capital/Settlement buildings

technology.short_description: Lavender-scented soul-stuff, captured at the precise moment of death and boldly infused with a frisson of eternal anguish.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +12 for Hellstriders of Slaanesh and Marauder Cavalry units

technology.short_description: Instead of dispersing, the initial shocking olfactory rush of fear settles into dizzying terror, providing a multi-layered experience of piling bodies.

effects.description: "Beastbreaker" ammunition (improved anti-large) for Marauder Horsemen of Slaanesh
Weapon strength: +10% for Hellstriders and Marauder Cavalry units

technology.short_description: Perceived only with senses particularly suited to appreciating incoherent agony, this frothing concoction staunchly refuses to be bottled or even to assume a stable state.

effects.description: Physical resistance: 15% for Spawn of Slaanesh units
Passive ability: "Horrible Regeneration" for Spawn of Slaanesh units

technology.short_description: A chimerical musk spurring both man and beast to inflicting depravities as stark as one's devotion would allow – and the name of Slaanesh allows for anything.

effects.description: Bonus vs Infantry: +5 for all non-Daemonic Cavalry and Chariot units
Vigour loss reduction: -20% for all non-Daemonic Cavalry and Chariot units

technology.short_description: A scent that melds the multifarious experiences of a mortal's life into a dream that feeds the souls of Slaanesh's acolytes as much as it feeds on them.

effects.description: Upkeep: -10% for all non-Daemonic units
Global recruitment duration: -1 turns for all Slaanesh non-Daemonic Units

technology.short_description: The bewitching aroma of unbound carnality infused with irresistible self-confidence and allure, Captivating Musk is every Daemon overlord's best friend.

effects.description: Seduce Units capacity: +1
Seduce Units cost: -20%

technology.short_description: Heights of agonised joy, the mingled moans and screams of atrocity, scents to make any mortal retch from sheer euphoria – the House of Excess presents its ultimate fragrance.

effects.description: Seduce Units budget: +50%

technology.short_description: Not a perfume, but a subtle alteration to the soul's olfactory capacities, whereby one is intimately attuned to the notes of suffering inherent in all things.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%
Income from raiding: +30%

technology.short_description: Distilled from a thousand Slaaneshi Champions' feats and failures, this fragrance changes with the wearer, though pleasure and pain both persist.

effects.description: Hero capacity: +1 for for Exalted Heroes and Chaos Sorcerers
Hero action cost: -20% for Exalted Heroes and Chaos Sorcerers
Hero recruit rank: +3 for for Exalted Heroes and Chaos Sorcerers

technology.short_description: A deceptively simple blend of distilled desire and total obedience – for those days when only instant gratification will do.

effects.description:
Army ability: "Narcissism"
	(all armies)

attributes.bullet_text: This unit is unable to activate abilities or cast spells.

technology.short_description: A forbidden perfume precipitated from Slaanesh’s honeyed voice and used in rituals of binding souls together by the roots of their sinful essence.

effects.description:
Wound recovery time: -2 turns
	(all characters)
Casualty replenishment rate: +10% for Lords and Heroes

technology.short_description: The entwined, peppery spices of sin and excess ensure that all fortunate enough to scent it will soon wear only a smile.

effects.description: Daemons Reforged: +10% hit points for destroyed Daemons of Slaanesh units restored after battle

Cooldown: -10% to Lores of Slaanesh and Shadow spells
	(all armies)

technology.short_description: Master-crafted by the taloned artisans of The Circle of Paramountcy, this sublimely sophisticated fragrance garbs its wearer in an aura of immeasurable power.

effects.description: Hero capacity: +1 for Cultist of Slaanesh and Druchii Anointed
Hero action cost: -20% for Cultists and Druchii Anointed
Hero recruit rank: +3 for Cultists and Druchii Anointed

technology.short_description: A scent composed entirely of that tiny pheromonal fleck known only to Slaanesh; the one thing in common between everyone who has ever been desired by another.

effects.description: Hero action success chance: +6% for Allurresses
Cooldown: -25% to Slaanesh Locus abilities

technology.short_description: Soft. Smooth. Captivating. Abjectly terrifying. This is temptation in a bottle – modern sensuality infused with timeless monstrosity.

effects.description: Hero action cost: -20% for Alluresses
Hero recruit rank: +3 for Alluresses

technology.short_description: All-permeating and inescapable, like the scent of something forever lost, yet forever at an arm's distance, leading the body and soul quite literally by the nose.

effects.description:
Slaanesh corruption: +2
	(all provinces)

technology.short_description: With its fresh yet sensual musk, this intoxicating fragrance compels flesh toward flesh in any situation. Its floral top note guarantees maximum fertility.

effects.description: Growth: +15

technology.short_description: Undeniable and infused with the inexorable single-mindedness of a creature that has no capacity for more than one thought.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for all non-Daemonic monster units
Ward save: 10% for all non-Daemonic monster units
